name: Blankos Block Party
description:
Blankos Block Party is a vibrant open-world multiplayer game styled like a giant block party, with a focus on custom art and design, building and exploration, and curating your collection of unique and rare Blankos.

Play Blankos your way. Go on solo quests and unlock new rewards to trick out your Blankos, or grab a squad and compete in epic block parties.

BUY. SELL. COLLECT.
The things you earn and buy in Blankos are yours to own. That's right - each Blanko is an NFT which means that they hold value and can be sold and bought on our marketplace.

MAKE YOUR OWN GAMES
Easily design and build all sorts of party games for everyone to enjoy, no coding required.All that's needed is a bit of creativity.

ICONIC DESIGNS
We've partnered with some of the world's most talented artists, designers, and creators for limited releases found only here. If you'd like to work with us for future designs, we'd love to hear from you.
